abstract_summ: As of 18 May 2020, the cumulative number of COVID-19 cases detected in Vietnam was 324, 16 cases from 4 cities and provinces in the first phase (during 20 days, 0.8 cases detected per day) and 308 cases in the second phase . Vietnam has mobilized its entire political system to fight the epidemic and achieved some initial successes . More than 80% of infected are mild cases of disease, 14% have severe complications and about 5% are categorized as critical disease victims .
